name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Core Engine/C++ Optimization Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development. Proficient in **C++**, with a strong focus on **multithreading**, **optimization**, **profiling**, and **shipping AAA titles**. Experienced in using **VTune** and various console profiling tools for efficient CPU/GPU crash dump analysis.
Diverse tech stack includes JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter** for frontend and backend development, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in deploying applications in cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, and developing solutions aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in AI/ML with experience in MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
